alert.note: Alert for South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SOCORRO AND SOUTHWESTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Abo, or 35 miles southeast of Belen, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abo. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 196 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
